about.iam: I am a Front-end developer based in Unna, Germany. I enjoy helping designers and companies bring their ideas into real life. I am looking forward to continuing my developer career with a job in a junior web developer position. If you think I’d be a good match for your projects, contact me!

myWork.explore:
Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with 
 projects to see my skills in action

project.projectJoin: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users andcategories
project.projectPolloLoco: Jump, run and throw game basted on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and tabasco salsa to fight against the crazy hen.
project.projectPokèdex: Based on the PokéAPI a simple libary that provides and catalogues pokemon information.

contact.projects: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
